timeline.message: init gradle 6.0
Fixed templates/build.gradle for using with gradle 6
Fix engine build
Add exclusion for jacoco, mockito generated classes

Reworked dependencies for "whitelist" libraries on compile-time
and speedup compile
Fix `gradlew game` run with new gradle

Fix server task
Fix tests after gradle upgrade
Add groups for gradle tasks
Implements gradle's substitute for engine and modules

Fix manifestClasspath
Fix gather libraries for distribution
Fix. move -Xmx options to jvmArgs
Remove configureondemand - it's incubating and don't work with version remapper (FacadeServer cannot building in workspace)

Simplify modules build.gradle
Move workspace features from module to workspace
Unify plugin style
Syncronize templates's build.gradle with Core's build.gradle
Add api dependency in engine for Light and Shadow
Configure gradle's maven-plugin instead artifactory plugin

Rename artifactory.gradle to maven.gradle
Cleanup maven.gradle
Replace deprecated call.
Fix auth parameters for remote maven repository
Merge PR #3806 by @DarkWeird - Gradle 6 upgrade and related
Version bump to v3
Minor tweaks, cleanup, and an arg fix
Rename `maven.gradle` to `publish.gradle` to clarify. Two minor maybe-fixes
Support redirecting Artifactory repo targeting via env vars (such as defined by a Jenkins Folder)
Helps to set a full URL
Matching version here to the general engine number
Experimental Jenkinsfile
Some build dirs changed
Improve gradle.properties template and tweak Jenkins more
Expose JOML as a package to modules
Bump to TeraConfig over a Checkstyle config issue

Merge Gradle rework

# Conflicts:
#	engine/build.gradle
Merge PR #3833 by @sin3point14 - whitelist JOML for modules
Add sin3point14 to game credits
Minor tidying
Plugin version issue - rely on Gradle default
Fixed UI to show red when dependencies aren't resolved.
Removed unnecessary changes
Able to highlight errors
Removed unnecessary changes
fixed loading bar issue

Merge branch 'agent-q1-develop' into develop

Fix loading bar overflow issue
Logger and unused variable

Revert "Restore pre-BiomeAPI foliage shading (#3802)"

This reverts commit 8ad3d164

The method in which I had implemented this breaks the server/client boundary by asking for server-specific information about the world in the client. It works fine in single-player, but of course it causes crashes when attempting to connect to servers. This feature still needs to be reimplemented, but it will be a much larger job that requires more infrastructure for obtaining the required information from the server.
Assorted Gradle/Groovy cleanup, new "refresh" Groovy utility task
Merge PR #3843 by @otradovec - code quality
Add agent-q1 & otradovec to game credits
Minor Gradle dependency tweak
Removed unused variables
Merge PR #3849 by @otradovec - code quality
What a difference one slash can make ... overrides were broken, no more! :-)
